attributes.action: Do not support Investor-state dispute settlement
attributes.additional_details: The UK government, against the wishes of many, and also that of many other governments wants to leave in the Investor-state dispute settlement which means that if your government sees something as fit then a company from abroad can steal the thunder from the UK Govt. God only knows why, the UK govt has decided it wants this rubbish in the projected TTIP. This is wrong. Check it out for yourselves.
